column4: I just restarted ubuntu because it crashed and now it has a blank desktop wallpaper. What can I do?
is there a keyboard command to restart ubuntu?
I have no dock, everything disappeared
I only have desktop wallpaper and right click, everything else is gone and I already reobooted.
Your screen may be virtual size. Try putting the cursor past all the edges and see if it scrolls
I'd suggest go to "It didn't work" part at bottom here and follow step to restore restricted-manager https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NvidiaManual
